item.title: access.redhat.com - Knowledgebase & Home page
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Investigating Issue

Summary: The company is currently investigating a major issue that is causing platform downtime.

Mar 1, 20:33 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: OCM Planned outage
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - OCM Maintenance Work on March 17, 03:00 - 09:00 EDT

Summary: The OpenShift Cluster Manager (OCM) will undergo maintenance work on March 17th, 03:00 - 09:00 EDT to make infrastructure improvements. The OCM web UI will be unavailable and backend OCM API calls will be ignored, but customer clusters will remain available and accessible.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 17, 03:00 - 09:00 EDT

Feb 28, 02:02 EST
Scheduled - The OpenShift Cluster Manager (OCM) will undergo maintenance work to make infrastructure improvements. The maintenance will start on Sunday, March 17th, 08:00 UTC (3:00 AM EDT) and may last up to 6 hours. During that time the OCM web UI will be unavailable and backend OCM API calls will be ignored. Customer clusters will not be impacted and they will remain available and accessible.

item.title: Access.redhat.com Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Feb 10, 19:03 EST
Completed - The Customer Portal maintenance is complete.

Feb 10, 15:54 EST
In progress - The Customer Portal is currently undergoing maintenance. It is expected that this maintenance will continue until February 10 at 11 PM UTC.

Feb 10, 12:16 EST
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Feb 10, 12:15 EST
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Feb 10, 09:00 EST
Scheduled - The Customer Portal will undergo maintenance on Saturday, February 10th from 3pm - 9pm UTC. During this time, logins will be blocked on various pages and you may experience disruptions in certain areas of the website. We do not anticipate any impact to key functionality to support case functionality and product downloads.

item.title: Quay.io Status Page Migration
item.content:encoded:
Feb 9, 13:00 EST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 9, 10:00 EST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 18, 15:15 EST
Scheduled - We will be migrating from status.quay.io to status.redhat.com during this time. No disruption to service is expected. status.quay.io will now point to status.redhat.com and quay.io status notifications will come from status.redhat.com.

Users will need to create a new subscription to status.redhat.com to continue receiving notifications. To do so, on status.redhat.com, click “Subscribe to updates” and select your method of contact. On the next page you can select the “quay.io” entry under “Components” (along with any other Red Hat services you may be interested in). Please let us know if you have any issues and thank you for using quay.io!

Scheduled - Back-end maintenance is scheduled for Feb 3rd 1AM-1:05AM EST. During this time Support Cases will be inaccessible, which means customers will not be able to view, create or edit cases. To create support cases during the maintenance window, use techsupport@redhat.com.

item.title: Red Hat Jira (issues.redhat.com) Scheduled Maintenance | 2023-11-18 3:30 AM UTC
item.content:encoded:
Nov 18, 02:30 EST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 17, 22:30 EST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 2, 06:47 EDT
Scheduled - Hi Team,

The Red Hat’s Jira (issues.redhat.com) will be unavailable for 4 Hr for scheduled maintenance starting at 3:30 AM UTC On Nov 18, 2023, for the database upgrade.

You can submit a ticket with us by sending an email to rh-issues@redhat.com if you have any questions.

Thanks
Sagar
